Thousands of people are ready to see those mounds!
To be honest, you weren't wearing much to begin with...
Let's keep this game moving! It's peak viewing hours!
The chat better be enjoying this...
Good show, ~name~! The viewers have been through the roof!

text.content: After that... fun game we had...
You agreed to meet up at a motel...
... and then you actually showed up!
You're insane, and I love it!
Let's go inside! The viewers have the attention spans of fruit flies.
Keep them entertained while I get more... comfortable.
This is going to be a fun night!
I had the Premium viewers vote on what we should do...
They made a choice that I've been meaning to try out more often...
